mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_FILE (COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, AUTH_SEQ, FILE_TYPE) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{AUTH_SEQ}, #{FILE_TYPE})

INSERT INTO SC_CONFLICT_MINERAL (COM_CODE, TANTALUM_YN, TUNGSTEN_YN, TIN_YN, GOLD_YN, COBALT_YN, MICA_YN, INSPECTION_DATE, PART_CODE) VALUES( #{COM_CODE}, #{TANTALUM_YN}, #{TUNGSTEN_YN}, #{TIN_YN}, #{GOLD_YN}, #{COBALT_YN}, #{MICA_YN}, #{INSPECTION_DATE}, #{PART_CODE})
mapper.select: SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as APPROVE_DATE, POINT, AF.FILE_NAME, AF.FILE_PATH FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_AUTH_FILE AF ON AF.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND AF.AUTH_TYPE = ACI.AUTH_TYPE WHERE ACI.AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT PM_IDX ,PM_PART_CODE ,pc.PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME ,PM_PART_PLANT_CODE ,PM_APPROVAL_STATUS ,PM_APPROVAL_DATE ,cm.COM_CODE ,cm.TANTALUM_YN ,cm.TUNGSTEN_YN ,cm.TIN_YN ,cm.GOLD_YN ,cm.COBALT_YN ,cm.MICA_YN ,cm.INSPECTION_DATE FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE and pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE = pc.PLANT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_CONFLICT_MINERAL cm ON pc.COM_CODE = cm.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1 AND pc.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE}
